info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:31PM EDT until June 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PIERCE AND SOUTHEASTERN BACON COUNTIES... At 231 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Bristol, or 10 miles east of Alma, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bristol and New Lacy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
